runs.comm: good length delivery to start, on off stump, van Wyk waits on the back foot and defends
that's quick from Powell, angling the ball into the right-hander from wide of the crease, van Wyk tries to work it off the pads but misses
this time Powell strays too far on the pads and van Wyk flicks it off his pads towards fine leg, it reaches the fielder on the bounce
hits a good length outside off stump and seams away from Gibbs who moves forward and lets it go
a bit of high bounce for Powell from a good length, Gibbs pushes it towards square leg
too far down leg side, you cannot bowl there with fine leg in the circle, Gibbs tries to flick but the ball clips his pad and runs down to the boundary, Powell spoils an excellent first over

Taylor can bowl pretty quick but he starts with a perfectly directed slower ball, van Wyk tries to flick but gets beaten by the change of pace, he gets hit on the pad in front of middle and leg, that looked out

bang, two in two, what a sensational start from Taylor, he pitches the ball full on off stump, it's nearly in the blockhole, Duminy tried to drive at it but was beaten for pace, the off stump goes for a walk

good length ball on off stump, de Villiers moves back in his crease and defends towards gully, he sets off for the single but gets sent back, the fielder throws at the batsman's end and de Villiers wants the overthrow but gets sent back once again
full toss on middle and leg, driven towards mid-on
another slower ball, it darts back into de Villiers and cuts him in half, the ball bounces a second time before reaching Ramdin

he's got another one! It was another slower ball, de Villiers tried to defend it on the back foot, the ball hit the bat but bounced onto the stumps after hitting the ground, Taylor has bowled a triple-wicket maiden, absolutely stunning

carnage, South Africa are in tatters, Gibbs flicked a full ball uppishly towards the right of the fielder at mid-on, it was nearly past Chanderpaul when he dived full length to his right and caught the ball one-handed inches from the ground, fabulous catch
runs the ball down towards third man for a single
that's wide outside off stump, the crowd voices it's approval
short of a length ball outside the off stump, the debutant Bodi lets it go
straighter line this time, flicked off the pads through square leg
driven off the back foot towards point, Pollock has no time to get his eye in, it has to be eighth gear from the start
short of a length on middle and leg stump, Pollock tries to swivel and pull it past the fielder at short fine leg but doesn't find the gap
fuller length on off stump, Bodi walks forward, pushes towards mid-off and calls for the single, Bravo throws at the batsman's end but misses
full ball angles into Pollock, he tries to close the face but the ball swings a little away from Pollock and takes a leading edge towards point
Pollock drives hard at one outside off stump, he edges it down to third man

disaster for South Africa, Bodi pushes a full toss towards cover and sets off for the single, the fielder at cover dives to his left and manages to stop the ball by pushing it towards Morton at mid-off, Pollock was late in responding for the single and both batsmen were stranded at the bowler's end when the throw came in to the wicketkeeper's end
short ball left alone outside off stump
slower ball on middle and off stump, Morkel defends towards point
the ball bounces sharply from a good length and seams away from Bodi, he pushes tentatively away from his body and gets beaten
Powell angles the ball across Bodi and nips it back into the left-hander off the pitch, he gets hit high on the thigh
it bounces sharply once again from a good length and hits the batsman high on the pad
width offered outside off stump, Bodi sits on the back foot and drives in front of the fielder at point, Bravo has  a man on the sweeper boundary
Morkel waits on the back foot and pulls powerfully to the fielder to the deep square leg boundary, that wasn't that short at all
defended towards point off the back foot, still no boundaries off the bat after five overs

another superb bit of fielding! Morkel pushed the ball towards mid-off and called for the single, Bravo sprinted in from cover, picked up the ball with one hand and threw down the stumps at the bowlers end in one fluid motion, Morkel was so far out that Jerling didn't need the third umpire
Bodi puses the ball towards point once again for a single
full ball on the pads, flicked down to fine leg for a single
extreme pace and bounce from Taylor, Bodi gets out of the way, the umpire calls it wide
fuller and wider outside off stump, Bodi chases it and gets a thick edge towards third man
defended towards the off side
good length ball on off stump, Bodi drives but gets an inside edge towards the leg side
good length delivery on off stump, Bodi defends the ball off the back foot towards point
a bit wider outside off stump, Bodi drives past the fielder at point for a single
Bravo bowls a slower off cutter outside off stump, Philander defends off the front foot towards the off side
Philander gets on to the front foot and defends towards point
another slower ball outside off stump, Philander moves forward and dwats it towards long-on
poor line, Edwards sprays the first ball down leg side, South Africa's score ticks over because of another extra
he's over-stepped this time, free-hit coming up, South Africa need to make it count
good length ball on middle stump, Philander swings hard at it and pulls the ball towards deep midwicket where Sammy field on the boundary, that's the first two of the innings

Edwards gets into the act! He bowls a slower ball that cuts back into the right-hander, Philander is stuck on his crease and he tries to drive, he gets hit on the pad in front of middle and leg stump, that's plumb
worked off the pads towards fine leg
short ball angles away from the left-hander, Bodi chases it but gets beaten
Bodi comes forward and gets hurried by a short ball and has to defend awkwardly to the leg side
Sammy bowls it short and beats Botha
there's another slower ball, Botha pulls but gets beaten by the change of pace
Botha tries to pull but the short ball is a bit too quick for him, he gets it away towards long-on
fuller delivery outside off stump, Bodi drives off the front foot towards long-off for a single
Botha tries to drive a ball from outside off stump and gets beaten by the seam movement away from him
this time he tries to run the ball towards third man but gets beaten once again
short of a length delivery on middle stump, nudged towards the leg side
good length delivery on middle and off stump, defended back towards the bowler
Bodi unleashes a ferocious pull but there's a fielder in the deep to keep West Indies' squeaky clean record of not conceding a boundary intact
another slower ball outside off stump, Botha checks his shot but lobs the ball dangerously close to the cover fielder
beaten for sheer pace, Bodi drives at it as the ball seams away from him and beats the outside edge
what a fiery bouncer, it rose at great pace and beat Bodi's attempted hook, called wide by the umpire for being to high, that was a harsh call
slower ball on off stump, Bodi pushes towards cover but decides against the single
St George's Park bursts into applause as Botha picks up a full ball and lofts it over long-on with a full swing of the bat, superb shot, it was in the slot to be hit and Botha dispatched it
slower ball on leg stump, Botha gets beaten on the flick and is hit on the pad
another slower ball beats Botha and hits the pad
Botha swings across the line, it's another slower ball, he makes contact and hits it to deep square leg
Bodi moves forward and tries to slog across the line, he doesn't find the gap and hits it to the fielder at midwicket
bowled him! Bodi tries to pull another one, the length isn't short enough and he gets beaten for pace, Sammy has a second look because he isn't sure if the ball has hit the stumps but it has indeed
Edwards spears one into the blockhole at serious pace, Botha leans across and defends it splendidly
Botha gives himself room to hit the ball through the off side but mis-times the shot
Botha backs away to another yorker and edges it towards the third-man boundary for the second boundary of the innings, both have come off Botha's bat
Botha once again makes room to a full-length ball and flat-bats it towards mid-off, he's taking a gamble, if he misses Edwards will hit

and Edwards has hit, not the stumps but Botha's head. Botha backed away towards leg side but Edwards followed him with a short ball this time, Botha was beaten for pace as he tried to pull and got hit squarely on the visor, that has hurt him
bowled full and down leg side, Botha gets inside the line and tries to flick but misses
Botha backs away to a full toss and hits it towards mid-on for a single
low full toss on off stump, Botha drives down the ground to bring Dale Steyn on strike for the first time
Steyn comes down and drives towards long-off for a single
full ball on middle stump, poor length from Bravo, Botha hammers it down towards the straight boundary, long-on can't cut it off
Botha pushes the ball towards midwicket to bring up the 50 for South Africa
Botha backs away and hammers Bravo with a flat bat over the long-off boundary, what an innings he's played, he's the solitary boundary-hitter for South Africa
slower ball to end the innings, Botha gets hit on the pads for a leg bye, 15 runs off the last over, full marks for grit to Botha for playing as he did even after copping a blow to the chin
